name: Needy Slime in a cozy house.
name_original: Needy Slime in a cozy house.
description: Press x or left mouse click to interact with objects. Take care of the slimes needs, the thought balloon indicates what he needs. Press z to highlight all interactable objects. Find you dont fulfill slime needs in 15 seconds he loses 1 hp, if he loses 3 its game over, fulfill all needs to win.
